fr.epita.quizManager.test

Class TestQuiz

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.epita.quizManager.test.TestQuiz

  • @ContextConfiguration(locations="/applicationContext.xml")
public class TestQuiz
extends java.lang.Object

    Description

    This TestQuiz class is used to test operations for QuizOperationsService object types.

    Usage

    This class should be used as follows:

    
        See JUnit4
        for more information

    Author:
    Stéfano Acosta - Álvaro Bilbao
